segments.text: I notice the bright daylight coming through the kitchen window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so neat and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the woman is standing at the sink, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying a plate, but the water is overflowing uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring down the front, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even flinch, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, a boy is on a stool reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting back, this is dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate, probably to catch the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl beside him has her hand up, begging for one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so naughty, stealing snacks like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool holds, but it looks ready to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is tense, with the calm outside mocking the inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
